storyInfo: The information that the Doctor sends to Ptilopsis forces Control to interfere with the experiment. Back at the site, Dorothy suggests shutting down the system and proactively injects herself with the experimental Transmitter.

attributes.content: They agreed to throw money our way, Saria.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Your speech was excellent. All those investors were moved by the future that you painted.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The future... of course.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I described some byproducts they would be interested in with the kind of language that they speak.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: It was only one short night, but it was far more exhausting than spending a dozen days in the labs.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: It's something we need to power through, for the time being.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Once our funding is settled, you can move into the laboratories whenever you want.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You know me well. That's the only reason that I'm bearing with all this.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Right, that academic named Ferdinand Clooney is very interested in your proposal too.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: He'll 'build the most fantastic laboratory in all of Terra at Rhine Lab'—That's what he said.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I welcome him, then.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I looked into his background.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: He feels more like a businessman than an academic to me. He might not understand you.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No, Saria.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I never needed anyone to understand me... Actually, I'd say I've already got more than I could ask for, having met you, someone so like-minded.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Right now, Rhine needs to amass more capable personnel and projects. We have to, if we're going to reach our ultimate goal.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You're Control. It's your call.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Some of Ferdinand's methods aren't exactly above board. A decent amount of his projects even have some under-the-table dealings with other big corporations or the government.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'll have a nice chat with him about the rules of the our cooperation going forward.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You'll help me take care of this, right?
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I'm the Director of Defense. That's my job.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But it will be very risky for you... and Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I just came up with a few new ideas that might even solve some flaws in that theory of mine—Right, what were you going to say just now?
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Never mind.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Thanks for that, Saria.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: It's because you're always here for me that I can focus on my job without worry.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You never needed anyone to come save you.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But you came nonetheless.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: That face again... You're angry.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: All those years out there have made you a more emotional person.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I thought you'd better understand my decision after you took a good look at the reality of the lands outside.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Answer me.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Did you authorize the experiment at Site 359?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I'll never lie to you.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I'm sure you know that better than anyone.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: But you also don't care what's going on over there...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You turned a blind eye to what Ferdinand is doing.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Just like you turned a blind eye to Parvis all those years ago.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Hm? Which experiment are you talking about?
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You don't remember...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You never remember any little thing that isn't related to your own research.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: There is only so much that the human brain can process. I have more worthwhile work for mine to focus on.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Ferdinand's little tricks bought me some time to relax, and it's thanks to him that I can concentrate even better. And think.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: My experiments have seen some major breakthroughs in the last few days. Why don't I tell you about them?
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Why you...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It's not like you're not interested.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You're just... worried about all those insignificant people and things.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: They were never insignificant.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You'll never escape the weight of those people and things, Kirsten.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: After all, both you and I... and Rhine Lab too, we're all grounded in this land, we've put down roots.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Why are you apologizing all of a sudden?;Changed your mind again?

attributes.content: Don't worry... We're still on the same side.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I won't do anything to you, at least not right now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's just... It's hard to say.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kirsten might not necessarily be on Saria's side.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I heard they used to be very good friends.;I heard they had a falling out.

attributes.content: You don't know what Rhine Lab was like back when it started...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kirsten's radiance brought all kinds of people in, at first, but it was Saria who quietly propped it all up.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: A falling out, huh? They had a huge fight in the Control office, and blew a huge hole in the roof of the Rhine building. Does that count?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Even then, Saria walked out of the office herself, and Control was completely unscathed too.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If the two of them... actually played serious, things wouldn't have ended so anti-climatically.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's just Kirsten doesn't care what kinds of experiments Ferdinand runs.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I was eager to make sure she's okay. That's why I lured you guys here... but I never knew Kirsten would interfere with what's going on at the site.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: That's why it was so important for Ptilopsis to see the truth behind the site herself.
Please inform Ms. Wright;Control needs to know we 'saw' everything.

attributes.content: You... you're not going to stop at telling Kirsten the situation over there?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The important thing is that you... that Rhodes Island has caught wind of this.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: If Ms. Wright doesn't want this information, there are lots of people that do.
Like Beachbrella and all the other companies competing with Rhine.;Like the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Arts Units, and Originium.;Like the Maylander Foundation.
Information is the most valuable bargaining chip there is.;Having information is the best way to keep yourself safe.
As long as Ms. Wright wants to keep Rhine Lab alive.
She has to intervene at the site.

attributes.content: You've been planning to force her hand since before you got here...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, she might just remember you for this.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Good. We really should get to know each other to improve our cooperation.;Sounds like I should be honored.

attributes.content: You're confident... No, you have real faith in your operators at the site.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's wonderful.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I have one last question, Director Muelsyse.
Are you bothered by those experiments?;Are you bothered by anything in particular?

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... At the end of the day, I'm the Director of Rhine Lab's Ecological Section. Not a lot of people ask me questions like that to my face.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hm... How should I answer this...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wouldn't you agree that if I didn't keep a secret or two, my charm would take a hit?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I still haven't received Ptilopsis's synchronized message.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Sorry, I don't have the time to fill you in on the details...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I still have ten... No, maybe eleven hollows to take care of.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Right, one more thing.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak got away.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: She might head to the site... she seemed like she had her own objective.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Right, I agree with you.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: She's more dangerous than we expected.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: *cough*... How am I doing?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: My robotic arm is overheating a little. That's all.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I won't let myself get hurt before things really get hairy.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Elena, you're staying here with me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You've contributed a lot to the experiment, and I am proud of your results. You've earned the right to stand by my side and witness the glory it brings us.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You turned the whole site... into a petri dish. You put all those Pioneers in danger just to create that giant monster.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What could it bring, if not disaster?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The way I see it...?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Several miles out, the silver geometric body remains steadily suspended above the site.
The body seems as if it has started a storm. However, aside from the chaotic gales, there are also countless scraps blowing around it.
Some of the scraps were originally trees, while others were once parts of buildings and machines, but all of them have taken similar shapes, hovering around the body in the center.
The geometric body could appear at any moment on the outskirts of other Columbian cities. It could also suddenly descend upon Londinium or central Kawalerielki.
It has redefined what people imagine when they think of Originium Arts, it has redefined the known rules of physics, and it will soon redefine the already changing tides.
A new era.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What I see is a new era. Its arrival carries with it all sorts of possibilities, chances at things we may never have thought possible. It also implies a change in the standings of factions old and new.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm taking these risks not for myself.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It doesn't necessarily have to be Columbia that enters this new era. It doesn't have to be Rhine, either.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But when the time comes, our money and connections will both leave us behind.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The city of steel we have forged will be torn apart at the hands of other nations, just as Lingones became fodder to a new hegemon.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The laboratories of which we're so proud will be dismantled and sold for scrap on the second-hand market, while Rhine's signs will be forgotten and slowly rust away in an underground warehouse.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: When that time comes, we will lose any chance we ever had to drive change. Our ideals will shatter, and we will be left to live out the rest of our meaningless days staring at the backs of those who have gone ahead.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: When the epoch decides who to leave in the dust, it doesn't think back on past glory, much less hold out for future potential.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: All we can ever seize is the present.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Searching for signal...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Connection failed.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Still no comms...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doctor, we've been surrounded.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: The living quarters probably won't last long. Soon, this building we end up leveled like the others at the site.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: The silver construct is controlled by the subconsciousness of the Hub's test subjects.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If we forcibly remove the treatment bands the pioneers are wearing...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Negative.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Removal of the treatment bands carries as much risk as the removal of Device #9.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: What if we interfere with their neural activities externally?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, that's too risky too. It's likely to cause brain damage.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even without the silver constructs... I have no idea how to go about waking them up. Those who are connected to the system might never wake up again.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's my fault... Ferdinand and I were the ones put them in this danger.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I need to save them. I must...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: In thirty seconds, we'll face... the tenth wave of attacks!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: No, the frequency is getting faster.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This can't continue.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Only I... can stop it.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Tiny grains of sand cloud the air, like an entire house shrouded within a fortress formed of loose sand.
There are countless silver substances laying outside of it. They seem curious about this fortress, not understanding why they cannot dissolve this seemingly fragile barrier.
You didn't stop it...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're just using your Originium Arts to offset its corrosion.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And your Arts Unit will fail soon.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not yet... Not so fast.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What have you done to yourself...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Just... a small experiment.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You... You implanted one in yourself...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Arts Unit...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Before I let anyone else into the lab... I need to ensure of the safety of the requisite steps.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They're switching up their attack patterns.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's part of us. It's curious, and it's a good learner.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A barrage of impact noises can be heard from the outside, as though a storm of silver rain is raging.
The rain keeps opening up holes in the sand wall, which are in turn patched by more sand.
We need to find some other way to buy time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doctor, let me try.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'll go outside and use my Arts to lure some—
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Greyy, that's too risky!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doctor, I told Mr. Sonny something when we were chatting earlier—these words have stayed with me for all these years.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: If I don't take a step forward, how will I ever know if my path lies out there?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Truth be told... I don't know if I'll be able to do it.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I might even mess up the moment I step outside... I... I can't help but doubt myself...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: But what if it works?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: All my mentors have taught me that whenever I start doubting myself, I should just remember... I've succeeded before!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: He takes a deep breath, lifts his head up, and looks at the darkness in front of him.
The silver geometric body has what appears to be eyes, but he knows what it is that he's looking at.
It's not a new kind of intelligent being, nor is it some kind of mysterious monster.
That is the fruit of human technology. It can be used, analyzed—
And, no doubt, defeated.
You... aren't anything to be afraid of.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Fear always stems from the unknown.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: And you... You were created with Arts. You're a byproduct born in the Pioneers' minds.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Humanity triumphed over the darkness of night... How could we lose to our own creations?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: A ray of light emits from his hand and bolts toward the dark shadow floating above their heads.
As expected, a not insignificant amount of silver liquid exits out of the Pioneers' quarters and entangles itself with the dark night as it tears madly toward the light he released.
That moment, the light is shredded into pieces, leaving only a few strands progressing deeper into the darkness.
But more and more lights then rise one after another.
Greyy's a brave man.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: He's just like Sonny... and the pioneers. He has the courage to face his challenges head on.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Its attacks have gotten stronger again...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: All my light can do is distract it; it still sees us as its target.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Your nose is bleeding...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even if you have no infected organs, your body's blood vessels won't be able to withstand releasing this much energy... It won't take long for you to hemorrhage to death.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I... I must protect them, and I'm willing to...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You're willing to give your life.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's not an excuse you're using to win over the Pioneers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're... really going to do it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Silence, wouldn't you make the same choice to protect your family?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I made the wrong decision once.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And I won't... make the same mistake again.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You mean, your mother...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: All these years, I've wondered over and over...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: How did they feel before they were swallowed whole by the sandstorm?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Did they wait, despairing in a cramped space until the moment of death arrived, like these Pioneers?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: What if I didn't accept that invitation? Would I have stayed with my mother until the very end?
If she had the qualifications to enter the city with me, would that have spared her from the storm?
My research has solved many difficult problems that were unsolvable, but I still haven't found an answer to this one—
Why was I the only one spared?
Dr. Silence...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If... If that is really the assemblage of the test subjects' consciousnesses...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I love it, just as I loved my family.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But why... why can't I hear it speak to me?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A deep fissure appears in the sand wall.
Dorothy stumbles forward, but a pair of hands catches her.
Dorothy... No matter how much work you put in, you can't change your mother's fate.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That storm is in the past... it ended long ago.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is... that so?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A drone fills the opening in the sand wall with its own body.
Seemingly injected with life once again, the grains of sand quickly rearrange in an orderly way.
Dorothy, you want to hear your family's voices, right?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You should ask those test subjects.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Once the storm is over, they will tell you their answer.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Agh...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: His hand is getting warmer and warmer. He knows that the machinery has been pushed past its limits for so long it is doomed to break.
But he cannot give up.
If he falls here, the island behind him will forever be swallowed whole by the darkness.
He has to hold on, just like that one night all those years ago. He ran so far away, even though his hands had gone numb from the cold and his legs hurt from the long journey—
He needs to make it to that day when he passes the torch he holds to another pair of hands.
Suddenly, a warm power shrouds his hand and helps him stabilize his energy output.
It is someone else's Arts.
O-Operator Ptilopsis...?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You require assistance, Operator Greyy.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You needn't alert me to the danger here.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I had already calculated the probability of our mission's success before I submitted my leave request to Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: What's the number...?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: With my support as a newly added variable, the probability of our success is...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: No, you don't have to tell me.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm just used to planning everything out before the actual execution. I know it was hasty of me to run out here, but I couldn't control myself.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Calculating the results will not reveal anything in advance.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Operator Greyy, what determines the result in the end will always be...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: The 'impulse' that drives you forward.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I cannot confirm whether the fluctuations of my brainwaves right now were caused by this 'impulse,' but it was none other than your actions that drove me here.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Operator Ptilopsis...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Even more light begins to emanate above him.
This is beyond the theoretical maximum output numbers that he and Mechanist, the designers of the weapon, had yet to measure.
But these are his Arts.
There has never been a theory capable of fully explaining Originium Arts... And furthermore, this luminance comes not only from his Arts Unit... It comes from his heart.
This luminance in the end pierces through the out-of-control test subject, through the darkness, the clouds, and all the unknowns above.
This thought, hidden within the sparks of electricity, pulses once only.
Nonetheless, Greyy grasps hold of it—He can feel the possibility within.
A weak signal has been detected...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Connecting.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Following an intense quake, the enormous test subject positions itself in front of the assembled onlookers.
There was no foreshadowing, and it left no trails of its movement. It simply appeared in that very position.
Agh...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Stand back, Greyy!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's an order—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence grabs Greyy's other hand.
A drone takes to the sky and, gathering the golden rays that began to disperse as Greyy's strength starts to give, charges straight toward the silver colossus that shrouds the sky.
The explosion is as loud as a thunderclap. The drone, having risen to the highest point in the sky, disintegrates into countless specks of light that flutter down.
I picked this up from Elena.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Though a trick like this will only work once.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This light... will extinguish eventually.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Message sent.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Our most crucial objective has been completed, right?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We did it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She reaches her other hand out to hold Ptilopsis.
The light above them slowly dissipates, revealing the enormous scale of the silver construct.
Yet it does not advance.
A layer of fine dust still stubbornly stands between them.
Dorothy...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're holding... a treatment band and the reagent.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're thinking of plugging yourself in...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I want to hear their voices.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I told you. I don't know how to wake them up, and I won't know how to wake you up!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You might find yourself swallowed by their consciousness, and your nervous system might see irreversible damage if we destroy this construct, and perhaps...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm a researcher. I'm willing to accept all the uncertainties.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But I'm your doctor!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can't just watch you risk your own life—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It'll be fine, Olivia.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This way, I will get to be with my family.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The test subjects behind her are unable to speak.
The silver construct before her remains silent as ever.
Dorothy closes her eyes and feels the silver reagent flow into her body.
The slightly cold sensation feels as if the fingertips of her family members are caressing her up and down.
Olivia...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I need the answer.
attributes.name: Dorothy
